headers.value: default-src 'self'; font-src 'self' data: https://fonts.gstatic.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com https://cdn.jsdelivr.net; img-src 'self' data: https://maps.googleapis.com https://maps.gstatic.com https://cdn.jsdelivr.net; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://maps.googleapis.com https://maps.gstatic.com https://cdn.jsdelivr.net;
